english.segment1: Ordinary, think of all I could have been. What were You thinking?. Temporary, what a fragile state for You to find me in
english.segment2: And if I lose myself in You. Will I find my hope renewed?
english.segment3: Someday, when I look into Your eyes. I will be caught up in Your majesty. And someday, for the first time in my life. I won't speak, and You won't have to answer me
english.segment4: Listen closely to the beating of my heart. Betrays my feelings. Sinking slowly, so afraid that I will never see that far
english.segment5: And if I give You all I can. Will You take as I am?
english.segment6: This is a part of my redemption story. Can't see much further down the road before me. But I will listen to experience. As it sings a song of your faithfulness
